summary: Collaborating with the frontend team to build responsive, user-friendly web interfaces using React and MUI. Developing modular, reusable components while maintaining a clean, scalable codebase aligned with best practices.

Developed and maintained full-stack applications using MERN and PERN stacks. Built frontends with React.js and Next.js, integrated RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js, and deployed containerized applications on AWS.
